fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 140.11 lakh crore compared with Rs 474.32 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 gained 114.45 points or 0.67% to settle at 17,100.05. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, dropped 8.94% to 14.77. Reliance Industries (RIL), Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) and HDFC Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The March 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 March 2023.
